data.title: 7-30 H1: M's Fall Short, Seahawks RB Zach Charbonnet Joins & Rashaad Penny Retires - The Gregg Bell Show w/ Christopher Kidd
meta_keywords: Seahawks RB Zach Charbonnet Joins & Rashaad Penny Retires
The Gregg Bell Show w/ Christopher Kidd
data.meta_description: The Mariners fight back but it's not enough as they lose to the Boston Red Sox 14-7. Gregg and Christopher discuss how the Mariners playoff hopes might again come down to the wire as it has in years past. Gregg Bell catches up w/ Seahawks RB Zach Charbonnet, and shocking news as former Seahawks running back Rashaad Penny retires from the NFL.
data.text:
He’s a former Secret Service Agent, former NYPD officer, and New York Times best-selling author. Join Dan Bongino each weekday as he tackles the hottest political issues, debunking both liberal and Republican establishment rhetoric.

If you can never get enough true crime... Congratulations, you’ve found your people.
